Aaron Rodgers was all smiles yesterday as a guest on ''Late Show with David Letterman .'' David Letterman handed Aaron Rodgers his WWE championship belt and even caught a pass across the stage from the Super Bowl MVP. There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there, Aaron Rodgers said as his eyes scanned the crowd, which was met with cheers from the probable Packer backers in attendance. David Letterman asked a series of light-hearted questions, with Aaron Rodgers willingly playing along.
